name: Desert Decryptor
description:
The alien who powers your desert crawler is going to die without proper sustenance. Decypher its language. Scavenge food. Keep it alive!

Bram: Code, game design
Mart: Code, sound
Siim: Art
Morr: Art
Dan: Art

Instructions:
Click to pick up objects
When holding an object: left click to throw, right click to drop
Tips to decypher the alien's language are in its spaceship.

Ludum Dare page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/desert-decryptor
